nodes.text: The Standard X space suit was a model of enviro-suit made by the Tagge Company and sold for  100. They were available during the Galactic Civil War between the Alliance to Restore the Republic and the Galactic Empire following the Battle of Yavin.

The Standard X space suit was first mentioned in Star Wars: Edge of the Empire Core Rulebook released by Fantasy Flight Games in 2013. It was then mentioned again in the Star Wars: Age of Rebellion Core Rulebook, released by Fantasy Flight in the following year.
